How many people are affected by Mabry syndrome ?,"Mabry syndrome is likely a rare condition, but its prevalence is unknown. More than 20 cases have been described in the scientific literature.",GHR,Mabry syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Mabry syndrome ?,"Mutations in the PIGV, PIGO, or PGAP2 gene cause Mabry syndrome. These genes are all involved in the production (synthesis) of a molecule called a glycosylphosphosphatidylinosi
